The education you receive from your family is more important than the education you receive from school.

To what extent do you agree with this statement and why?

Some argue that academic education is more important due to students being able to prepare their careers properly by studying different courses. A school is also a place where students are allowed to deal with the relationships between classmates and teachers. However,youngsters are able to have a sense of morality when they are under the teaching of parents.

There is no doubt that school is the best place for students to get prepared for the future career. There are plenty of different academic courses for students in high school,such as chemistry,geography or history which can provide some concepts to students who are interested in getting a related job in these subjects. Not to mention that some specific jobs will have requirements that students need to achieve a certain education level. Moreover, youngsters can develop their communication skills in schools. Take teamwork as an example,they often need to do team projects with their classmates which allows them to learn how to cooperate with their team.

In contrast,there are things that schools are not able to teach the students. Parents usually are role models for their children because they spend much more time with their children than anyone else. According to this, the best way for youngsters to develop their morality and behaviors is to learn from their parents. Having Morality holds the same importance as having a high education level, by having a sense of morality, youths can determine whether the act is right or wrong. For example, honestly, humbleness or tragedy are some of the crucial values that will affect them directly.

After discussing whether school or parental teaching is holding a higher value or not, academic education certainly allows students to develop their interest in different subjects to get prepared for their career and know-how to deal with the relationships between other people. By learning with parents, it will help children to create a sense of morality which is also important. After all, there is no right or wrong for the method of teaching, as long as it is beneficial for children.
